teaser.body: We are always looking for great people, and given our global footprint and the vast services we offer on dozens of project types, we may very well have a position that’s perfectly suited for you.

variants.title: Color Block
variants.name: colorblock
variants.note: Allows use of `.bg-regal-purple`, `.bg-legacy-red`, and `.bg-timeless-gold` helper classes.
